description.value: An extension to represent characteristics of PractitionerRole, backported from FHIR R5.

purpose.value: This extension enables the representation of specific PractitionerRole characteristics such as business functions, certifications, or other defining traits in R4, aligned with R5's PractitionerRole.characteristic element.

definition.value: A property or characteristic of the PractitionerRole, such as business function or certification, backported from FHIR R5.
Identifies the meaning of the extension, which is the R5 PractitionerRole.characteristic.
A property or characteristic of the PractitionerRole, represented as a CodeableConcept.
